Reviews.Title: “Bring earplugs”
Reviews.Author: Soren K Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: 8 huge buildings 160 total hard bed breakfast seating 12 people breakfast walls literally hear footstep outside unclean boot doesnt sound theres price pros cheap location theres nice street town nights fine bring earplugs youll set

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for...good thing you aren't paying much”
Reviews.Author: BSMinNY
Reviews.Content: wife trying cheap decided try rate 27night pay serious updating badly fresh coat paint dresser drawers didnt mold bathroom ceiling overall relatively clean front desk staff pleasant beware southwest airlines passengers front desk staff idea talking print boarding passes thankfully people guest services disney hollywood studios printed free location hotel relatively convenient 10 minutes disney 20 minutes universal dont stay try 35night hotels irlo bronson future terrible experience brag
